rules.title: No Infrastructure to Presentation
rules.description: Infrastructure layer should not import from presentation layer

rules.title: Domain Layer Isolation
rules.description: Domain layer can only import from domain layer (pure domain)

rules.title: Application Layer Dependencies
rules.description: Application layer can import from domain, infrastructure, and shared

rules.title: Services in Application Layer
rules.description: All service files must be in the application layer

rules.title: Max Dependencies in Domain
rules.description: Domain files should have at most 10 dependencies to maintain modularity

rules.title: Max Dependencies Global
rules.description: No file should have more than 20 dependencies

rules.title: No God Objects
rules.description: Prevent god objects that know too much about the system
rules.prompt: Check if any class has more than 15 methods or more than 500 lines. These are likely god objects that should be split into smaller, focused classes.
